introduction: In the first century BC, Burebista, centralized Dacian state leader, the struggle for the unification of the kingdom and regaining of old Dacian lands. Supported by the high priest and military commanders Deceneu Dacians, Burebista lead a skillful political alliances to defend both Romanian and expansion of the Celts.In the 70s BC, expansion of the powerful Roman Empire touches, south of the Danube, the rich lands of the Gauls united in a great and powerful kingdom under the scepter brave Burebista.
